entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Saturday 29 April 2023
